text: Hey - I have a developer account/site and want to play around with email templates - but i’m getting  “You need Marketing Professional in order to build Email templates. Learn more”
Can a developer account not work on emails?

We have a developer account and have access to emails, though we had to go through our Account Manager to enable this, as they had to whitelist any email addresses we wanted to send tests to (to avoid a situation where a developer could potentially use a dev portal to send out as many emails as they like). Not sure if this is still the case though
there is a lot of confusion around this.  <@U2H3TT8F2> might be able to help.  certain links on HubSpot send you to different acct types.  would be nice if this was cleaned up
thank you, sir.  I never know which one of you to tag
It’s all good. AJ and I work closely together. I responded more so if AJ sees he knows I’m on it
`for content in contents` show 10 items only, is there a way to show all existing items?
